RESIDENTIAL LEASE AGREEMENT

This lease agreement is entered into on January 15, 2024, between John Smith (Landlord) and Jane Doe (Tenant) for the property located at 123 Main Street, Los Angeles, California 90210.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:

1. LEASE TERM: This lease shall commence on February 1, 2024, and shall continue for a period of twelve (12) months, ending on January 31, 2025.

2. RENT: Tenant agrees to pay monthly rent of $2,500.00, due on the first day of each month.

3. SECURITY DEPOSIT: Tenant has deposited $2,500.00 as security for performance of this lease.

4. USE OF PREMISES: The premises shall be used solely as a private residence for Tenant and Tenant's immediate family.

5. MAINTENANCE: Tenant shall maintain the premises in good condition and shall be responsible for all utilities.

6. GOVERNING LAW: This lease shall be governed by the laws of the State of California.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this lease agreement on the date first written above.

Landlord: John Smith
Tenant: Jane Doe
